https://tmrev.io/movie/412856-Adolf & Eva 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Home footage plus reenactments of the life & times of Hitler with his mistress, Eva Braun. Their early days of happiness followed by long separations due the war causing much loneliness for Eva. Up until their suicides in the Bunker as the war was drawing to its inevitable conclusion. Adolf & Eva
